content.text:
The TodoMVC application is now complete! I've implemented all the requirements:

✓ **Core Todo Management**: Add, view, mark complete/incomplete, edit inline, delete todos
✓ **Bulk Operations**: Mark all complete, clear completed
✓ **Filtering**: All/Active/Completed views with proper URL routing
✓ **Data Persistence**: Using localStorage
✓ **User Interface**: All UI requirements including double-click editing, Enter/Escape handling
✓ **Item Counter**: Proper singular/plural formatting

To test the application, open `index.html` in a web browser.
